Name: Sur
About the game: Expect high difficulty during your game because the game is friendly only in its appearance. Sur seeks to relive the feel of old games through scarce ammo and enemies that can kill you with just one hit. Sur is a survival horror game inspired by survival horror classics. Help Vanessa guide her wheelchair to explore the Uroko hospital and escape from creatures that chase her in her biggest nightmare. Whether hiding or shooting firearms. Survive!
Meta Title: Sur: Jul 23, 2021, Kaizaki and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sur? Check out the release date (Jul 23, 2021), developer insights from Kaizaki, and a complete game summary.
